name: Shuggr
slogan: Shuggr is a social network for gay and transgender in the Middle East

jobs.title: Android Developer for Gay Social Network
jobs.description:
Shuggr (سكر) is a social network for the gay and transgender community. We are a young start-up with high growth potential, connecting thousands of users every day.

As Android Developer you will maintain and further develop our existing Android mobile app. With your expertise and understanding of intuitive design you will ensure the best user experience for our app.

⭐️ Your role

Maintain and further development our Android mobile app
Collaborate in a cross-functional team to define, design, and ship new features
Work with external data sources, APIs, unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
Fixing bugs and improving application responsiveness, quality and performance
Embrace new technologies and methodologies to improve development efficiency

⭐️ Your profile

Proficient with Java (that's our current code base)
Understanding of Android UI principles and interface guidelines
Familiar working with RESTful APIs, third party libraries and API, cloud message APIs and push notifications
Knowledgeable with performance tuning, threading and on-device storage
Understand code versioning tool Git
Experienced in continuous integration
Passion for building a product that connects, encourages and inspires people
Interest in empowering the gay and transgender community
Commit to at least 20 hours per week
You don't need to be a specialist in all of these things, but you should be able to have informed conversations and know how to research what you don't know.

⭐️ Your benefits

We are a start-up in the works and offer equity, that means you will get shares of the company
We are a globally distributed team, you can work remotely from anywhere

If you know anyone who could be interested in this role, please forward this job ad. If you think you can contribute to our success in another way, feel free to write us.

We're committed to an inclusive and diverse work environment. We welcome applicants of any gender, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, civil or family status, age, disability, race and mental profile.

jobs.title: Marketing Strategist (Middle East) for Gay Social Network
jobs.description:
Shuggr (سكر) is a social network for the gay and transgender community. We are a young start-up with high growth potential, connecting thousands of users every day.

As Marketing Strategist you will accelerate our growth in our Middle Eastern key markets Turkey, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates and Iraq.

⭐️ Your role

- Create a marketing plan and sales strategy for our key markets
- Build strategic partnerships with local organizations and businesses
- Act as liaison between local user needs and product development
- Be the go-to expert regarding our key markets

⭐️ Your profile

- Understand the needs of the local gay and transgender community in the Middle East
- Fluent in Turkish or Arabic
- Entrepreneurial growth mindset with hands-on attitude
- Education and work experience in marketing
- Ability to envision and lead change
- Willingness to own problems and comfort with ambiguity
- Passion for building a product that connects, encourages and inspires people
- Interest in empowering the gay and transgender community
- Commit to at least 20 hours per week

You don't need to be a specialist in all of these things, but you should be able to have informed conversations and know how to research what you don't know.

⭐️ Your benefits

- We are a start-up in the works and offer equity, that means you will get shares of the company
- We are a globally distributed team, you can work remotely from anywhere

If you know anyone who could be interested in this role, please forward this job ad. If you think you can contribute to our success in another way, feel free to write us.

We're committed to an inclusive and diverse work environment. We welcome applicants of any gender, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, civil or family status, age, disability, race and mental profile.
